data.title: Great food and great atmosphere!
data.text:
BWW is the place where my friends and I go to when we want great food and to hang out in a great atmosphere. We have been here many many times but this is the first time I have reviewed it. All the food we have tried (boneless and traditional wings in many different sauces and rubs, nachos, sandwiches, salads, cheesecake bites!!) have been delicious! 
All of our waiters have been extremely friendly and accommodating! It's great to have so many tv screens around. 
When it gets busy, it gets very loud but it's part of the experience!

data.title: 3 stars for my very favorite  WINGS
data.text:
We stopped here for lunch on our visit to Union Memorial Terrace,last week. As we are a big time fan of Buffalo wings, we ordered WINGS with Buffalo sauce and GRILLED CHICKEN BUFFALITO which are the loaded tortillas with grilled chicken,salsa and buffalo wild wings sauce....

Food was delicious,but the server we got was very rude...Even the service was too slow.It took half an hour to get Buffalo Wings on our table.

data.title: Good restaurant in chain
data.text:
Although this is one of the restaurants in the Bdubs chain, this one seemed a step above some others we visit. The beer seemed to be chilled to a nice temperature and the bartender was on her game keeping up with a busy bar and service area. 
Wings came out hot and not over sauced so that was good.  Enjoyed being there for dinner and drinks  and was able to visit without it being to loud inside. Would recommend if you are in Madison.

data.title: Reliable food
data.text: This is another reliable bdubs! Great food & service! If you're in the mood for winds & sports, you know where to go!! Here!!

data.title: What's to say? It's your typical BWW.
data.text: The food is consistently good, and service depends on who is on duty. It's loud, as people try to talk over music, but it's a moderately priced dining option with wings, burgers and dogs primarily. It isn't fine dining by any stretch, but it's great for what it is supposed to be. The only problem is the loudness, which is typical for this type of venue (like Red Robin, also very loud). But again, the food is consistently good.

data.title: Good
data.text: Good food, ambient and service. Not so expensive but you can find cheaper, if it's what you are looking for. It's nice to go when have a game going on so you can watch in the bar.

data.title: Always a good meal....at BWW!!
data.text: I love Buffalo Wild Wings so writing a review for this place is a no-brainer.  My first time in Madison last month included a stop at Buffalo Wild Wings.  Service was great, beer was cold, and the wings were as good as always!!  Had a great time with friends......

data.title: Service was great and food was quick
data.text: we recently visited and the experience was good.  It was very busy, and the manager or service leader came to our table to tell us they were getting pretty busy, and assisted us in getting our drinks and if we wanted apps started. More restaurants should do this!! it was great.

data.title: Always good food
data.text: This is just a few blocks from the Kohl Center but get there early before a game, it gets very crowded. The prices are a bit high and the service was a bit slow, but the waitress seemed overwhelmed and did apologize. I've been to a few BWWs and this one had an unusual layout, but I guess it's the food/drink that matters.

data.title: Good stop after Badger games!
data.text: Just visited BWW on State. We sat at the bar and was well taken care off right from the start. The wings are always delicious along with the service. The atmosphere is great if you can't get tickets to be part of a Badger game.

data.title: Friendly staff. Very casual - no worries
data.text:
Besides of the great wings, our waitress jenni was very friendly.  The atmosphere is very casual and low key. No stress just beers, wings and thousands of tv with sports.

My only worry was the barroom. I thought it would be dirty and horrible but it was very clean and you can still here one of the tv from the speaker system.

We had a nice time and we'll be back for more drinks and wings

data.title: Love the honey barbecue sauce!
data.text: I love coming here each Thursday for boneless wing day.  It's a great place to watch a game, too!  The food is tasty and the service is usually quite good.

data.title: EXCELLENT place to eat!!
data.text: I had never eaten at a Buffalo Wild Wings and I loved it! There were several College kids but they were in and out. The wait staff was fantastic and our food was out fast. I like things as plain as I can get them and places normally mess up my order but the waitress and cooks got it perfect! There are TV's on every wall to watch any game you want. They had hockey on a couple, basketball on a few. It was kind of loud in there because we got sat right by one of the tv's.  Everything was pretty cheap and tasted great! Everyone was really friendly!

data.title: Great Sports Bar
data.text: My wife & I are in Madison quite often and we usually stop at Wild Wings as they have all the sports events on for great viewing. The food is excellent & the service is very good and the location is excellent as it is on West side close to where we are. Several stores & hotels within short drive make it a good place to hang out while wife is shopping.

data.title: Too Busy
data.text: The Buffalo Wild Wings in Madison is nothing special. It's larger than some BWW's that I have been to, but it is popular with the college crowd and, therefore, is ALWAYS packed. I've waited over an hour for a table there before. Not worth it.

data.title: Wings
data.text: Service was good and it was Not too far from the hotel . Just next to the mall. Worth the walk. They have Spotted COw on tap there also!

data.title: Made my stomach queasy after
data.text: I've been to B dubs once and I have to say I'm not a big fan of it. I went on boneless wings thursday and I waited longer than normal for my food. It came and wasn't great. The chicken was dry and not very tasty. After I went home, my stomach started acting up and I felt sick. Don't think I'll be going back.

data.title: not as bad as it looks
data.text: we wanted a quick dinner, with a beer; we weren't keen on the brand or the outward appearance; but the food was pretty good (fish tacos: tasty and good value); wide beer selection; and pretty lively (football games on TV, if you like that sort of thing - we do).

data.title: New Location a Winner
data.text:
Just visited this newly relocated BWW's  (formerly on State St.) which is now in the Lucky Building on University Ave., 
Fantastic location near UW campus and downtown which students love and parents can appreciate on the way to Kohl Center or other campus events.
Parking is available in nearby ramps or as you will on the street.

While the restaurant is not as spacious as some, the layout is classic BWW with dining area separated from bar area, multiple televisions encircling diners with a couple jumbo "TV's" for the BIG game viewing. A festive mood was enhanced by the free raffle for a variety of prizes including Badger BB game tickets and upgrades.

Our server was extra attentive, but not pesty.  We never felt rushed and could enjoy watching the Packer game, at least until our team beat themselves:(
Soda was replenished readily without requesting.  We tried an appetizer sampler which was more than enough for two of fried  bar food samples.  Typical fried "delicacies" which we might not indulge in frequently, but OK occasionally.  Dipping sauce makes anything fried better.

We really appreciated the NO SMOKING policy we enjoy in Madison.
 
A design flaw in the restaurant layout was how the Ladies room is located in the far back corner of the bar.  I had to weave my way around tables with bar patrons and then try to fit in the narrow passage way past a popular arcade shooting game.

data.title: Yawn
data.text:
Went to the East Towne location for a work birthday lunch and was totally underwhelmed. My chicken sandwich had zero taste and was as dry as a bone. Somebody from our party send back their pulled pork because it was totally overcooked and congealed into a hard, solid lump.

What's with all the TV's - absolutely ridiculous......it was like eating at Best Buy!

Service was fast, efficient and friendly.
